main event: Two citizens observed a luminous object in the sky that moved at high speed and disappeared shortly after being seen.
interesting points: The object was observed to give off a brilliant light and change shape during its appearance.,It was reported that the object seemed to be controlled from the ground.,The object hovered and then rose vertically before moving off horizontally.,Numerous witnesses, including automobile drivers, observed the object for approximately 45 minutes.,Attempts to photograph the object were unsuccessful due to its bright glare.
sighted object: a luminous object in the sky
witness description: citizens who were watching TV when they noticed the object
